[b]Overwatch 2: Storefront[/b]

I played Overwatch (1) since open beta.  I slogged through the years of no content, and when they announced OW2, I was so excited.  I suppose this is unrelated, but Overwatch League (OWL) was the first ever eSport I got into as well.

And then OW2 finally dropped.  The focus on the shop was over the top. Ads for the game would focus on the shop, their Twitter would focus on the shop.  Ok, ok, fine.  My friends and I would play and mostly enjoy it (the battle pass was already starting to erode enjoyment).  But when they announced that the promised fully developed PVE progression system was off the table, we all felt like we were suckered.  

Thing is, 5v5 PVP is fine. I know some people rail on it, I honestly thought it made playing tank a lot more fun.  Are there balance issues, sure, there always will be in games like this IMO.  But I just had a hard time continuing to play when all of the progression rewards were moved to the shop.  And it's not like you can earn in-game shop currency by playing either.

Effectively Blizzard decided to squeeze their playerbase.  But they squeezed too hard. They're bleeding players.  If it wasn't for the absolutely greedy monetization, maybe the game would be worth playing.  Just another example of a floundering live service that is looking to exploit the playerbase instead of entertain.

Observação:

vou colocar essa observação primeiro pois acabei esquecendo de comentar, não gaste dinheiro com esse jogo, e nem compre essa "historia" de 70 conto, vai por mim. jogue apenas o pvp dele mesmo pra dar aquela testada, talvez ate se diverte um pouco mas não gaste nada.

Introdução: 

 Quem diria que a blizzard colocaria seus jogos na steam, foi uma consequência da "tentativa" da compra da microsoft com actvision? talvez, mas pelo menos focaram em outros horizontes em vez de focar apenas no teu launcher. Mas chega de enrolação, overwatch é um hero shooter que originalmente(o primeiro) foi lançado em 2016 e foi aquela febre mundial mas de tempos em tempos essa febre foi abaixando depois de varias decisões incertas da blizzard mas ainda tenho fé que essa empresa safada tenha boas decisões depois do lançamento da steam.

Historia: 

historia dentro do jogo pode esquecer, praticamente nulo pois o foco principal dele é o online pvp, o que agrega um pouco para um sub-enredo acontece em alguns eventos em expecificos, curtas de animaçoes que a blizzard faz(que são muito boas diga-se de passagem) e algumas hq que a propria empresa lança tambem. Pra tu entender um pouco tu tem que correr atraz disso e que na minha opinião são boas(alem desse "modo" que estão vendendo a 70 conto,não vou comprar ainda).
 

Gameplay: 

 Como eu disse no topico anterior, o jogo é um hero shooter, o que isso quer dizer? um modo de jogo pvp com varios herois com funcionalidades diferentes como tanks, suportes e dano. E faz muito bem seu papel, jogabilidade descente e responsiva(isso devo parabenizar eles pois jogo essa desgraça tem ANOS kkkkkkkk)


Gráfico: 

 Graficos mesmo colocando no mais baixo possivel pra ter "maximo de fps possivel" pois esse jogo é bem competitivo, ele são muito bonitos.

 

Conquistas: 


ha, pra quem é fanatico por fazer 100% nos seus jogos eu tenho uma coisa pra falar pra tu, ESQUECE, nem eu que joguei essa bosta faz 8 anos ou mais fiquei com 70% de conquistas. Pois consiste em fazer certas ações com cada personagem e fazer eventos passados que "talvez" não volte mais nesse jogo, mas pra quem conseguiu meus parabens e se alguem for querer fazer esse 100% te desejo a sorte do mundo meu rapaz.


Conclusão: 

 Concluindo meus amigos, pra quem ja esta habituado com o jogo overwatch 2 é simplesmente um divisor de sentimentos gigantesco(vc ama ou vc odeia ele) pois tu pode estar se divertindo com ele ou simplesmente te frustrar pois ele é 100% de time, e depender de time em jogo competitivo é uma faca de 2 gumes, tirando essa frustração de anos jogando, ele é sim um jogo divertido pra jogar com os amigos ou ate sozinho mesmo com uma gameplay boa e bem responsiva, a historia como falei é em outros meios e suas conquistas vai demorar um belo de um tempo e disposições do ser humano pra fazer o 100%. A nota que dou pro Overwatch é um 7/10(e olha que estou sendo bondoso).

Овервотч — отличный командный шутер для тех, кому хочется именно много стрелять и не отвлекаться, скажем, на прокачку, как в мобах, или длинные побегушки по огромным картам, как в королевских битвах. Здесь прекрасные ощущения от стрельбы (револьвер Маккри — моё отдельное уважение), классный левелдизайн («Кингс Роу» — одна из моих любимейших карт в принципе) и по-приятному потные катки (если, конечно, участники выкладываются на полную и не тильтуют). Плюс Овервотч, в отличие от Тим Фортресс 2 (которую я тоже люблю, если что) просто-напросто современная игра со всеми сопутствующими приятностями и удобствами.

Я играю в Овервотч с релиза в мае 2016-го и никогда не уходил из игры надолго. Но Овервотч 2 всё изменил. Теперь тут:
— Жаднющая монетизация вместо щедрых лутбоксов.
— Залоченные новые персонажи вместо автоматического доступа.
— Кроссоверы и совсем безумные скины вместо более-менее приземлённых в мир игры обликов.
— Куча лишней косметической шелухи, которая призвана всего лишь забивать пустоту в батл пассе.
— Невыполненные обещания с PvE.

PvE — отдельная сильная боль, потому что, как говорили разработчики в районе 2019-го, именно ради размашистого PvE развитие первого Овервотча замедлили и начали делать сиквел. В итоге сиквел стартовал без PvE, а когда PvE всё-таки вышел, оказалось, что там не будет обещанной прокачки и метагеймплея, а вместо единой сюжетной кампании собираются выпускать разные платные комплекты с котом в мешке — тебе не дают попробовать миссии заранее или поделиться ими с товарищем. Абсолютно все игроки в пати должны купить миссии, чтобы проходить их вместе.

Ради чего тогда затевалась вся сомнительная движуха с отдельным сиквелом, никто не знает. И образ прекрасной практически во всех отношениях игры у Овервотча развеялся: теперь игру сопровождает дурно пахнущий флёр сомнительных решений, невыполненных обещаний и обильных микротранзакций. Так что негативные отзывы в Стиме вполне оправданы.

Но это всё равно отличная игра в своём геймплейном ядре. Это всё равно единственный современный командный шутер такого рода (опять же, ТФ2, на мой взгляд, устарел во многих вещах). Это всё равно игра, благодаря которой я нашёл много новых друзей, с которыми общаюсь уже несколько лет.

Так что Овервотч — всё-таки хорошая игра. Просто помните, что до хорошего в ней теперь придётся продираться через весь тот дурной флёр, который Близзард сама и напустила.

Контора оптимистов

My favorite character is the reaper guy. he is very powerfull. special move, honestly is one of the best in the game and so he comes equipped with these two revolvers and only takes about 3 or 4 shots to actually execute a kill so it comes really in handy specially when you come from the side.

About 30 or so minutes of my playtime was just the [i]single[/i], extremely small Invasion event mission that is available for free at this moment. ...and then promptly got off once I realized that the rest of the PvE was locked behind a paywall. The event mission functions more like a very short demo or teaser for this-- now botched and NOT the promised-- campaign I've been waiting for since late 2019.

To be perfectly clear, I would have been willing to spend money on the PvE gamemode if the game overall [b]wasn't[/b] a clear cash-grab.

Needless to say: Not surprised, but still extremely disappointed.

Primero los CoDs, ahora este juego, solo faltan los warcraft y starcraft y ya puedo desinstalar el launcher de blizzard.
Finalmente esse jogo foi "lançado".
The first game was better

A Pesar de que juego esto, hay mas cosas negativas que positivas

>Battle pass/ pase de batalla. si lo comparamos con títulos como Fortnite o fallguys, Overwatch no le queda muy bien tener un pase de batalla, teniendo en cuenta que es fácil de obtener puntos mediante jugar y jugar partidas sin misiones con condiciones ni nada, lo cual lo hace aburridisimo y te pasas el pase de batalla en menos de 3 días, Es un favor para aquellos que quieran rushear los pases, de paso consta decir que las recompensas parecen un chiste de mal gusto y nada memorables.

>Pack de invasión. Sumado con los impuestos de los países con una moneda no estable  no hará que el precio valgan la pena y en su lugar prefieran gastarse toda esa plata en algo que merezca la pena para el consumidor, demas esta decir que ya vi casos de gente desquiciada que lo compro solo para toparse que su dlc no les ha cargado o directamente no se los dieron.  4000 pesos por un PVC no hará que merezca la pena comprarlo.

>Tienda. hay monedas dentro del juego, las monedas grises son las que mas te van a dar en los pases de forma gratis pero solo te servirán para comprar lo que te dejen en tu menú de heroes, demás esta decir que algunas cosas no te dejaran comprar sea porque son del pase de batalla o por ende tienes que comprarlos si o si en la tienda, Luego de las monedas grises tienes las Monedas de oro que te dan muy poco y solo se consiguen por un tiempo teniendo jugadores te recomienden de forma seguida.
El precio alto por lo que ofrece la tienda se sobre pasa del precio de un pase de batalla el cual para colmo al final del pase aun comprado no te dejan con suficiente monedas doradas para comprarte otro pase (lo cual Fortnite hace bien)

>Balanceos. Aun con la actualización seguimos con el problema de los balanceos Entre jugadores que se quedan pegado al monitor por meses y los que apenas pudieron instalarlo, Tuve que soportar no 1 sino 10 o 6 partidas con gente que apenas sabia manejar a los heroes (lo cual, no esta mal, pero para otros que ya sepan manejarlos hace de darles una experiencia horrible a los nuevos)

Cosas positivas: 

Heroes. Los cambios entre varios heroes como doomfist, Sombra y Orisa tienen cambios decentes, sobre todo con Sombra dando counter a Lifeweaver. 

>Invasion pack. de momento, es interesante, A comparación de MvM de TF2 ofrecé de ir un punto A a punto B, teniendo que defender y buscar objetos para avanzar. pero solo recompensa Experiencia y creo que también puntos para el arbol de maestría, mas no objetos para vender en la tienda de steam como MVM lo hace, Lo cual si solo quieres disfrutar de la campaña sin ser recompensado con algo despues de unas buenas horas de dedicación adelante.

>miscellaneous. Puede ser cosa mía o es que hay aspectos que parecen refrescar el juego como algunos sonidos y música de los mapas, Demas esta decir que me pareció muy entretenido no solo de ir a capturar un solo punto, si no que también de ir a diferentes sectores del mapa para capturar haciendo de la experiencia aun mas disfrutable 

>illari. Nuevo heroe, Puede ser una experiencia relajante o tu nueva razón para odiar al juego instantáneamente, parece una combinación entre Mercy, Baptiste y widowmaker esta en un punto medio pero no es imposible matarla. 


Lastimosamente para lo que ofrece parece una estafa, pero en temas de actualización para la jugabilidad lo veo refrescante mas no tan WOW!

En resumen. que no se note que estén muriendo de hambre, hacen ver a TF2 mucho mejor a pesar del problema de los bots y eso que me fui de ese juego por estos 4 años 

aunque un punto a favor muy grande es..... que podemos desinstalar battle.net YEPEE!

Como un consumidor mas del montón, si quieres jugar esto por un ambiente diferente  sin importar las recompensas Adelante, pero si también lo que quieres es tener recompensas pues lastimosamente obtendrás poco, sea el héroe que mas te encante

I have played this game since early 2017. Shit started going down the moment Brig and Doomfist entered the game. GOATS was a thing, double shields was a thing, pretty much everything that was shit or could be shit , happened, that being said, Overwatch 1.5 is probably the worst piece of shit they could have done. Not only did they promise a completed new game on top of the PVP which they lied about for ages then cancelled, now we're stuck with this 5 vs 5 cluster-fuck of gamemode where the heroes are still designed for 5 vs 5 and everything is still out of balance. They took CC out of the game only to implement it back but give it to Cassidy and Mei. They nerfed Hanzo after 6 years so he cannot 1shot you anymore...if you're Mei or Reaper.  fuck you if you re 200 HP you re still getting 1 shot.
The lore is still pretty much where it was when the game began, what do you know about Soldier now that you didin't know in 2016? the fact that he's gay? 
Hanzo and Genji have no had a heart to heart since "Dragon" ( rip Hanamura]
Mei took about 7 decades to meet Winston, which conveniently enough  was just in time for Ow 1.5
Mercy exists, Widowmaker shot and omnic and Sigma's entire lore is summed up to cosmic mad man is mad and barefoot. 
An amazing game with a vastly interesting and cool lore that the team took no interested in developing left to hang , ripped to shreds by corporate greed and kept alive since 2019 by porn and fanfiction. Good job Blizzard, remind us to purchase the PVE expansion for 15.99 if we wanna see a fraction of the story everyone was promised.
A sore upon the gaming community.  Blizzard is a deceitful company beyond compare, there is no "Overwatch 2".

According to the numbers, If you wanted to buy everything that was available in Overwatch 2, You would need $10,226. That's 10222600 in-game earnable coins. If you got all 60 earnable coins a week, every week, it would take a grand total of 327 years. Not months, years to earn everything in the shop through grinding the in game coins out. Okay well obviously we're not going to be earning everything in the shop like was possible with the loot crates from Overwatch 1. What about just some Legendary skins? Well the Legendary Skins cost 1900 in game coins. And you can earn up to 60 earnable in game coins a week just by playing. So that would total out to 30 and a half weeks to earn ONE legendary skin without spending money. It really seems like this system was designed for the betterment of the players enjoyment of the game and not to appease the shareholders. Maybe i'm just a insane nazi though who doesn't know what he's talking about.
Honestly, It's too boring.

[h1] Ради этого умер Overwatch 1 [/h1]

[b] Что мы получили: [/b] 
- Мы получили Боевой пропуск, о котором никто не просил
- Мы получили платную косметику, которая стоит дороже оригинальной игры
- Мы получили режим Push, который вызывает лишь рвотные позывы
- Мы получили кучу обещаний, которые не факт что сбудутся 

[b] Что мы потеряли: [/b] 
- Мы потеряли уровневую прогрессию
- Мы потеряли 2-го танка в команде
- Мы потеряли целый режим
- Мы потеряли обещанный PVE
- И в конечном итоге мы потеряли несколько лет поддержки игры и игру, за которую заплатили деньги

[b] Overwatch 2 - это настоящая трагедия. [/b] 
В 2016 году игра выиграла звание Игры Года, а теперь это бесплатная срань, что интересуется лишь твоим кошельком.
